# NVIDIA CUDA-Q

> CUDA-Q is a programming model and toolchain for using quantum acceleration in heterogenous computing architectures. It streamlines hybrid application development-CPUs, GPUs, and QPUs working together-and offers support in both Python and C++.

## Documentation

- [Home](index.md): Introduction to CUDA-Q
